hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT Menuid ,'' AS Type ,'' AS Url ,COUNT(*) AS Count ,0L AS Lastcount FROM Widget WHERE Isstatic = 0 AND Deletedate = 0 AND ( Menuid != '' OR Menuid IS NOT NULL ) AND NOT Type IN ( 'MultiRssReader' ) GROUP BY Menuid ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT Menuid ,'' AS TYPE ,'' AS Url ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Widget WHERE Isstatic = 0 AND Deletedate = 0 AND Menuid = w.Menuid ) AS COUNT ,COUNT(*) AS Lastcount FROM Widget AS w WHERE Isstatic = 0 AND Deletedate = 0 AND ( Menuid != '' OR Menuid IS NOT NULL ) AND CreateDate > :CREATEDATE AND NOT TYPE IN ('MultiRssReader') GROUP BY Menuid ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT '' AS Menuid ,Type ,'' AS Url ,COUNT(*) AS Count ,0L AS Lastcount FROM Widget WHERE Isstatic = 0 AND Deletedate = 0 AND ( Menuid = '' OR Menuid IS NULL ) AND NOT Type IN ( 'RssReader' ,'MultiRssReader' ,'MiniBrowser' ,'FragmentMiniBrowser' ) GROUP BY Type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT '' AS Menuid ,Type ,'' AS Url ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Widget WHERE Isstatic = 0 AND Deletedate = 0 AND Type = w.Type ) AS Count ,COUNT(*) AS Lastcount FROM Widget as w WHERE Isstatic = 0 AND Deletedate = 0 AND ( Menuid = '' OR Menuid IS NULL ) AND Createdate > :CREATEDATE AND NOT Type IN ( 'RssReader' ,'MultiRssReader' ,'MiniBrowser' ,'FragmentMiniBrowser' ) GROUP BY Type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT '' AS Menuid ,w.Type ,u.shortValue AS Url ,COUNT(*) AS Count ,0L AS Lastcount FROM Widget as w,UserPref as u WHERE w.Type IN ( 'RssReader' ,'MiniBrowser' ) AND Isstatic = 0 AND Deletedate = 0 AND ( Menuid = '' OR Menuid IS NULL ) AND Name = 'url' AND w.Id = u.Id.WidgetId GROUP BY u.shortValue ,w.Type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT '' AS Menuid ,w.Type ,u.shortValue AS Url ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Widget AS w2,UserPref AS u2 WHERE w2.Isstatic = 0 AND w2.Deletedate = 0 AND w2.Type = w.Type AND u2.shortValue = u.shortValue AND w2.Id = u2.Id.WidgetId ) AS Count ,COUNT(*) AS Lastcount FROM Widget AS w,UserPref AS u WHERE w.Type IN ( 'RssReader' ,'MiniBrowser' ) AND Isstatic = 0 AND Deletedate = 0 AND ( Menuid = '' OR Menuid IS NULL ) AND Createdate > :CREATEDATE AND Name = 'url' AND w.Id = u.Id.WidgetId GROUP BY u.shortValue ,w.Type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
